attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition you to give help for the Catholic Church to preserve all our listed churches in order that our heritage can be there for the generations to come and  for the Gory of God in our worship

rejection.details: This is only being rejected to allow you to correct the text "Gory of God" to something more appropriate.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
